item.title: Snake Sneaks Onto Plane And Delays A Flight In Australia
item.description: The 2-foot green tree snake was found Tuesday in the plane's cargo hold as passengers were boarding a Virgin Australia flight in Melbourne.

item.title: China's Robot Soccer Team Getting More Buzz Than Their Human Counterparts
item.description: While China's men's soccer team hasn't generated much excitement in recent years, humanoid robot teams have won over fans in Beijing
